attributes.action: Reduce privet CoVId test prices or NHS do testing with minimum prices for travel
attributes.additional_details: Privet provider are costing 80 to 140 pounds per testing and after introducing day 2 / day 8 testing it’s very high burden on individuals and As in this pandemic only those people travelling which have high necessities of travel ( like family problems / death in family / people stuck from long time due to pandemic ) In these situation very difficult to pay such a big amount , so either reduce privet test cost of these test need to be done by NHS with minimum costing
attributes.background: Ask privet CoVId testing provider to reduce testing cost or NHS should provide testing for travel purposes with minimum amount . It’s too much burden sometimes more than flight cost to take minimum 4 test ( 1 before departure / 1 before arrival , and day 2 /day 8 test during quarantine )

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Lower the price of the £210 COVID Home Test Kits for travellers entering the UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575509

Scrap the compulsory £210 home test kit when arriving in UK: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577580

Make COVID-19 tests during quarantine free or optional: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577612
